That was... rather abrupt. Since another RPer with key characters 
and such has just quit, the council (i hope they don't mind that i'm 
speaking for them) is open to suggestions on what we should do, 
either just continues as if the characters/stuff hadn't existed, 
finish off the IGL, restart the rpg, gah, i dunno... hit me with 
some stuff PLEASE.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> I quit.  Lost my "Hysteria" by Def Leppard album and that just 
shoved me over 
> the line of anger and don't feel like putting up with this RPG's 
crap.  No, I 
> won't go into some gay story about my life in the RPG or anything 
else.  I 
> quit.  Enough said.
